channel.title: Blackscreen with autospawn?
channel.description:
[u][b]EDIT: I tried again right after this and it worked for some reason, I was literally trying for 3 hours, and it's such a simple task... this can be locked/deleted[/b][/u]
I stole a list from another source something like this [code]spawn = 397 3263 3293 0 3265 3295 3261 3291 2 Lumbridge Cow spawn = 1768 3263 3288 0 3265 3290 3261 3286 2 Lumbridge Cow spawn = 81 3262 3283 0 3264 3285 3260 3281 2 Lumbridge Cow[/code] But when I try to add my own text in there [code]spawn = 945 3096 3107 0 0 0 0 0 1[/code] I get a black screen, I've tried everything I could think of to fix this, It's odd because the cows, rock crabs, shop keepers etc don't do this but when i add my own it doesn't work
So I'm in need of some help, Why does this happen and how can i fix it?

item.title: Blackscreen with autospawn?
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Use the ‘tab’ button as opposed to the spacebar.

Read full topic

item.title: Blackscreen with autospawn?
item.dc:creator: @Cmoodo Cmoodo
item.description:
@Cmoodo wrote:

EDIT: I tried again right after this and it worked for some reason, I was literally trying for 3 hours, and it’s such a simple task… this can be locked/deleted

I stole a list from another source something like this

spawn = 397 3263 3293 0 3265 3295 3261 3291 2 Lumbridge Cow spawn = 1768 3263 3288 0 3265 3290 3261 3286 2 Lumbridge Cow spawn = 81 3262 3283 0 3264 3285 3260 3281 2 Lumbridge Cow
But when I try to add my own text in there

I get a black screen, I’ve tried everything I could think of to fix this, It’s odd because the cows, rock crabs, shop keepers etc don’t do this but when i add my own it doesn’t work

So I’m in need of some help, Why does this happen and how can i fix it?

Read full topic
